mapper.select: select a.*, b.*, c.like_check from board a join member b ON a.memberNo = b.memberNo left join likes c ON a.boardNo = c.boardNo AND c.memberNo = #{memberNo} WHERE a.memberNo IN ( SELECT followingMemberNo FROM following WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo} and followingCheck = 1 ) AND a.delYn = 'N'

SELECT a.*, IFNULL(b.like_check, 0) AS like_check, m.memberId, IFNULL(f.followingCheck, 0) AS followingCheck FROM board a LEFT JOIN likes b ON a.boardNo = b.boardNo AND b.memberNo = #{memberNo} LEFT JOIN member m ON a.memberNo = m.memberNo LEFT JOIN following f ON m.memberNo = f.memberNo AND f.followingMemberNo = #{memberNo} WHERE a.delYn = 'N' ORDER BY a.likeCnt DESC, a.boardNo DESC

SELECT a.*, IFNULL(b.like_check, 0) AS like_check, m.memberId FROM board a LEFT JOIN likes b ON a.boardNo = b.boardNo AND b.memberNo = #{memberNo} LEFT JOIN member m ON a.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE a.delYn = 'N' ORDER BY a.boardNo DESC

mapper.update: update following set followingCheck = (case followingCheck when 1 then 0 else 1 end) where memberNo = #{memberNo} and followingMemberNo = #{followingMemberNo};
